name: Late Lino
description:
Once upon a time, in a strange planet called Cube... There is a boy, who just got transferred from the Stellar for a christmas duty--collecting candies.

However, it was not as smooth as planned. The path is full of ghosts and Lino need your help! Help him to reveal and avoid ghosts with the Stellar's aid.

You only need to hover your mouse and give it a click when it is needed, and absolutely good reflex, good focus and good luck!

  • Lino's movement is random!
  • Avoid getting zoomed by... things!
  • Hover around for vision, listen to enemy cues!
  • Click to stomp (you can't spam for a reason.)
  • Maintain good vibe by having Lino bathed in light, you'll get rewards!
  • Collect requested candies to clear a stage.
  • Get badges for extra challenges!

Note this little game was finished in 2012, was once an entry for LudumDare jam #22 called Saint Lino, then we decided to enhance the game by putting more stages. Not really balanced nor free from bugs, but anyhow, enjoy the holiday vibes! 🎄🎇✨🎁

(PS: the links inside the game might be invalid as we moved our site from stellar-0.com to stellarNull.com)

  • Code & Design @ricolemba
  • Graphic & Concept  @lazcht
  • Audio & Dialogue  @clealeshlick
  • Soundtrack: https://stellarnull.bandcamp.com/album/late-lino
  • Bonus Album: https://stellarnull.bandcamp.com/album/late-christmas
